title: PHP Extensions-mongodb
text1: 1. mongodb extension: php mongodb extension, allows php programs to connect to MongoDB databases, read and write data
text2: 2. mongodb extensions are PHP version specific, for php versions less than 7.0, mongodb extensions use version 1.7.5, for php versions greater than 7.0, mongodb extensions use version 1.14.1
text3: 3. If not installed, click Operation->Install to install the mongodb extension
text4: 4. After installation, you can click Operation->Copy Link, copy the extension link code and paste it into the PHP configuration file to use the mongodb extension
text5: 5. After changing the PHP configuration file, remember to click Restart or Reload Configuration in the Services section to make the configuration take effect
